title: Crusader Pack
description: This core supporter pack includes 950 Points total, the Crusader Supporter Forum Title, Crusader Supporter Armour Pack, Crusader Hood, Crusader Cloak, Crusader Apparition Effect, Crusader Weapon Effect, Crusader Portrait Frame and everything in the Basilisk Pack.
longDescription: This core supporter pack includes 950 Points total, the Crusader Supporter Forum Title, Crusader Supporter Armour Pack, Crusader Hood, Crusader Cloak, Crusader Apparition Effect, Crusader Weapon Effect, Crusader Portrait Frame and everything in the Basilisk Pack.
